Name: Fallen Cube
About the game: Description Fallen Cube is a puzzle game where you should in any way deliver the red cube (or cubes) to the destination , which is green (if one cube) or purple (if two cubes) marker. You will be prevented by other cubes of different types. You will be given several removal points, after spending which you will be able to clear the way for the red cube to the marker. Features 90 levels relaxing background soundtrack pretty good timekiller comfortable graphics Controls 'Left Mouse Button' - For removing blocks 'Spacebar' - Restart level
Meta Title: Fallen Cube: Jul 14, 2017, WRD and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Fallen Cube? Check out the release date (Jul 14, 2017), developer insights from WRD, and a complete game summary.
